lastSession.summary: v5.2.1: Fix SessionEnd hook error — removed duplicate hook registration from .claude/settings.json and setup.sh settings.local.json template. The $CLAUDE_PLUGIN_ROOT env var is only available inside the plugin system (hooks/hooks.json), not in project settings context, causing '/hooks/session-end.sh: not found' error on session exit.
completedTasks: Diagnosed SessionEnd hook failure: $CLAUDE_PLUGIN_ROOT empty in .claude/settings.json context
Removed duplicate SessionEnd hook from .claude/settings.json (plugin's hooks.json already handles it)
Removed duplicate SessionEnd hook from setup.sh settings.local.json template
Bumped version to 5.2.1 in plugin.json and .plugin-version
nextSteps: Verify session-end hook works correctly on next session exit
Run setup.sh on a test project to verify settings.local.json no longer contains duplicate hook

recentChanges: v5.2.1: Fix SessionEnd hook error — removed duplicate registration from settings.json and setup.sh
